definitions.name: VISB_SVG_UPDATES
definitions.value: ran(%(i,j).(i:1..999/scaling & j:1..799/scaling|rec(`id`:"pixel_"^TO_STRING(i)^"_"^TO_STRING(j), fill: {nothing_pos |-> "#008000", hold_button_pos |-> "red", zoom_slider_pos |-> "grey", airplane_pos |-> "white", block_time_pos |-> "yellow"}( ((POINTS * {nothing_pos}) <+ ui_element_at_point)(i*scaling |-> j*scaling) ))))
